backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, suppliers, products, categories, orders, carts, Stripe config, and authorization via mixins and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected files, components, and test IDs for a build/deployment failure investigation task.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose, features, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing/layout component handling authentication, onboarding redirects, landing UI, and authenticated app structure.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Unauthenticated access screen prompting the user to log in via Internet Identity.
Admin-only button that seeds demo products through backend addProduct mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing attribution, dynamic year, and placeholder policy links with caffeine.ai tracking URL.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header handling auth, cart count, and links based on user and supplier status.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with basic navigation links and a dynamic caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Landing page header with logo and a button that scrolls to the email input section.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and supplier option.
frontend/src/components/seller/ProductFo: Dialog for adding or editing products, including images, categories, and pricing.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerDas: Onboarding card set guiding suppliers through initial store setup and product creation.
Top bar for seller dashboard with search, notifications, and user avatar.
frontend/src/components/seller/SellerPro: Displays a seller’s product table with editing, stock adjustment, and deletion actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe with secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, suppliers, Stripe, checkout sessions, and product/order operations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode themes, and utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages local‑storage backed shopping cart with quantity updates, removal, totals calculation, and empty‑state UI.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that loads cart items, calculates totals, and creates a Stripe checkout session before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/CreateStorePage.tsx: Form page for creating or updating a supplier store, prefilled when editing and submitting via API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Marketing landing page with email capture that triggers Internet Identity login and onboarding flow.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancelled message with links to retry checkout or return to cart.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a successful payment confirmation with options to return home or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product catalog with searching, filtering, sorting, and add‑to‑cart functionality using supplier and category data.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Seller dashboard showing store info, onboarding actions, and product management with a product creation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/StoreViewPage.tsx: Renders a supplier store page with hero banner, product listings, and add‑to‑cart logic using supplier/product queries.
frontend/src/pages/SuppliersPage.tsx: Displays a grid of suppliers with product counts and navigation to product lists or individual store views.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Exports static asset paths for logos, banners, placeholders, and landing images.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides sessionStorage helpers for persisting onboarding email and redirect targets across auth flows.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Resolves product and cart image URLs with fallbacks to a placeholder asset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, animations, and container settings for the UI system.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes.
